title: Aaron Hernandez: Murder, suicide & wasted life
itunes:title: Aaron Hernandez: Murder, suicide & wasted life
description:
Former NFL Patriots’ star Aaron Hernandez was found dead in his prison cell five days after a jury found him not guilty in two murders. Prison officials say he hung himself with a bed sheet, although his lawyer suggests it could’ve been murder. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke discuss the tragic life and death of a once promising football superstar in this episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
